message.content:
cs.LO, cs.SC, cs.DS, cs.SE, cs.PL

The paper deals with analyzing and reasoning about safety properties of software systems, which falls under the category of formal methods and verification (cs.LO). The focus is on loops and recursion, which are common in algorithms and data structures (cs.SC and cs.DS). The approach involves computing closed form solutions of linear ordinary recurrence equations, which is related to symbolic computation and computer algebra (cs.SE). Finally, the implementation of the method is done using the Mathematica package Aligator, which is a programming language and environment for symbolic mathematics (cs.PL).
